description: ChIP-Seq data for 3 Acute Myeloid Leukemia - SAHA sample(s). 11 run(s), 11 experiment(s), 11 alignment(s) on human genome GRCh38. Part of BLUEPRINT release August 2015. Analysis documentation available at http://ftp.ebi.ac.uk/pub/databases/blueprint/releases/20150820/homo_sapiens/README_chipseq_analysis_ebi_20150820
